p: According to obtained data, both C. verum leaf oil and chlorhexidine digluconate significantly reduced the germ tube formation of C. albicans and C. dubliniensis (p < 0.05) with all tested concentrations. Both C. verum leaf oil and chlorhexidine digluconate at 1.0 mg/mL (MIC) concentration completely inhibited the germ tube formation of both Candida species throughout the experiment period (6 h).
